data.name: نیکوتک
data.description: Nikootec is a family owned firm, providing best in class animal and human health products for over 25 years in Iran. Nikootec is the forerunner of probiotics in Iran and representative of the Protexin International range, the first probiotics to be registered in Iran   Our focus is on reputation, high standards and good business practice with reliance on scientific marketing.   We have brought new technologies and thinking to Iran and have contributed to new health practices.
